articles.title: Wesley Fofana makes sudden U-turn on Man Utd transfer "dream" with contract decision - The Mirror
articles.description: Leicester City have confirmed that Wesley Fofana has signed a new bumper contract, keeping him at the club until 2027 with a return from injury believed to be just days away
articles.content:
Wesley Fofana has ended speculation over his immediate future by signing a new long-term contract at Leicester City.
